moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
